scenario_text.value: Uh... Aoi? What are you doing here?

What? T-Takuma?! I should ask you the same
thing!
(Hm? Aoi seems nervous for some reason.)

(I wonder if this is somewhere she likes to
come to be alone.)
Uh... Should I not be here?

What? No! Of course not! I just like to spend
time here alone sometimes.

(She doesn’t even have Labramon with her.
That’s dangerous.)
Hey, Aoi...
This is dangerous.
Why come here?
What are you planning?
You shouldn’t be out on your own.
Yeah, I know. I’m sorry.

It’s just, whenever I really need some time
to myself, this is where I like to go.
What’s so special about this place?
Uh... Do you really want me to say?

(She seems upset. Maybe I shouldn’t have
asked.)
Anyway, uh, sorry to make you worry.

You’re not plotting something out here, are
you?
What? Of course not!
I’d never plot anything! It’s not like that!
It’s just, uh, um... I’m sorry.
Hey, you don’t have to apologize.
It’s not like you did anything wrong.

Honestly, it makes me feel kind of awkward
when you apologize for nothing like that.
Oh, right. Sorry.

Not again! Er, uh, you don’t have to
apologize.

Try and be more bold! Or something, I don’t
know.

Like Minoru! Yeah. He’s always in high
spirits...

(Ugh, I don’t even know what I’m trying to
say anymore!)

Heh... Ha ha ha ha ha! I’m sorry, I shouldn’t
laugh, it’s just...

Oh, but I guess I shouldn’t apologize either.
Thanks, Takuma.
